ygData.msgSnippet: ... He what? She looked down and shook her head. Oh no...this is not good....Oh by the matrix how did this happen? OH War...Sure he knows that no matter how

:KitKat::

"He what?" She looked down and shook her head. "Oh no...this is not 
good....Oh by the matrix how did this happen? OH War...Sure he knows 
that no matter how I would feel....I can not return his feelings." 
She looked down and sighed. "What am I going to do? I can't hurt 
him...not now...not ever. But what am I going to do.. I'm to be 
marrid to Drillbit. Surely he knows this?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  "You give him something that nobody else has. A heart. I have 
never seen him 
> so focused and happy. Just trust me...he will make you happy. As a 
soilder 
> and as a personal friend or mate. As for his past. He was trained 
by the best 
> assains the council has. He then formed the group of our four 
horsmen. We 
> have brought many pred victories togeather. But you are the first 
person he 
> has ever taken orders from. He loves you."
